p: The total RNA from leaves of transformed plants was extracted using trizol (Invitrogen, USA) for final verification of the transformed plants and stable expression of GUS gene. After treatment with DNase, the first cDNA strand was produced by a cDNA synthesis kit (Eurex) and Oligo-dT primer. Finally, two strands of cDNA were synthesized in a thermal cycler (Bio-Rad) by specific primers.
